title: Effect of transformed height on summary statistics

content.prompt: Height, in meters, is measured for each person in a sample. After the data are collected, all the height measurements are converted from meters to centimeters by multiplying each measurement by 100. Which of the following statistics will remain the same for both units of measure?

choices.label: The standard deviation of the height measurements

topic.text: 1.7: Summary Statistics for a Quantitative Variable

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Calculate summary statistics, relative positions of points within a distribution, correlation, and predicted response.
